bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. capable of bringing forth serious infectious diseases. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry ling yang jiao 羚羊角：能治一切熱毒風攻注，中惡毒風，卒死昏亂不識人 , “It is capable of curing all types of attack and influx of heat poison wind, when one was struck by malign poison wind , with sudden [appearance of] death, clouding with confusion, and a failure to recognize persons”.

② Pathological Condition of a sudden swelling with heat and pain. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry ye zhu dan zhong huan 野豬膽中黃：治鬼疰，癇疾及惡毒風 , “To cure demon attachment-illness, epilepsy ailment, and malign poison wind ”.
